overview: Flying City Planning (空飛ぶ都市計画 , Soratobu Toshi Keikaku) is a single by CAPSULE whose music video was directed by Yoshiyuki Momose, animated by Studio Kajino and produced by Yamaha Music Communications. It premiered alongside the 2005 film Touch (タッチ), based on a manga by Mitsuru Adachi. The song was released on the mini-album AEROPOLIS by the now-defunct Contemode label on September 10, 2005.  It is the final entry in a SF trilogy which includes, Space Station No. 9 and Portable Airport.
title: Flying City Planning
